title: What is implied about the desalination of seawater

content.prompt: What does the article imply about the desalination of seawater?

choices.label: Desalination may not be an economically feasible method of increasing the water supply.
Many coastal cities have started using desalinated seawater for fish farming.
Desalinated seawater cannot be used for drinking or cooking.
Desalination would decrease peopleâ€™s motivation to conserve water resources.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
